analyzed: phyag 'tshhal lo/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i/_/hum las byung ba'i

original: nag po che/_/zhal gdangs mche gtshigs gad mo sgrogs/_/'jigs byed khyod
analyzed: nag po che/_/zhal gdangs mche gtshigs gad mo sgrogs/_/'jigs byed khyod

translated: Always revering all the buddhas,🔽your neck is adorned with a garland of skulls.🔽I praise you, protector, who completely destroys all obstructing forces.

analyzed: gsal dbyings su gcig pa'i rtags/_/thung zhing sbom la brjid pa'i sku/_/
